attributes.action: let the children of Farmers continue to live on the land. Allow single dwellings in the country for farmers to allow there children to build next to them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
(Out of town shopping centres, Cul de sac's, Estates) all allowed at present special rules when it comes to building in the countryside. 
Let the children of farmers have some give and let them build in the countryside. Farmers off-spring have to move to the nearest large town city to find housing that is affordable, Whilst they have land which could be built on instead of travelling large distances daily to look after the farm.
Give them the right to build on thier own land.
